column1: When I first saw the trailer ,  seeing Jane got me worried,  I thought her arc will ruin the movie yet I stayed hopeful that it maybe as good as thor:ragnarok or even more , I thought thor will try to truly find himself , I thought  thor will travel the world with guardians and then gorr would be shown and Christian bale would be given justice , he played so nicely  and jane would just have a small cameo  where she got the hammer or would be like valkyrie in ragnarok and thor realizes that he doesn't need the hammer to control his power  , but they completely ruined it 🤦 the potential this movie had was destroyed
the worst film of the MCU. an absolute waste of time, energy and money. if the director doesn't care, why should we

It’s such a shame MCU completely screw up this epic storyline so badly.  Also, MCU continues to treat Asgardians like they are just weak and normal people like human when although they are far less powerful than Thor and Odin, they still are much much stronger and much more durable than most species in the universe because of their much denser physiology.  Even a regular Asgardian can lift tons and endure powerful energy blasts.  They also heal faster .  They should not be just a village of helpless folks as depicted in the movie..
Too bad this movie sucked.
no this movie has no right to live in this universe
The first trailer had me hyped. This trailer has me ULTRA HYPED.

1:50 The musical transition here is just so perfect. It went from despair to hope, using the last note of a dark tone and bringing in the first note of the avengers theme.
